message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $15,000.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I'm eager to make a deal, $12,000 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I'm still very interested in the product, but I'm afraid $13,500 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
